targets.expr: avg(irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{instance="$instance", application="$application", exception="none", uri!~".*actuator.*|.*open-api.*|.*webjars.*", outcome="SUCCESS"}[5m]) / irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{instance="$instance", application="$application", exception="none", uri!~".*actuator.*|.*open-api.*|.*webjars.*", outcome="SUCCESS"}[5m]))

avg(irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{instance="$instance", application="$application", exception="none", uri!~".*actuator.*|.*open-api.*|.*webjars.*", outcome!="SUCCESS"}[5m]) / irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{instance="$instance", application="$application", exception="none", uri!~".*actuator.*|.*open-api.*|.*webjars.*", outcome!="SUCCESS"}[5m]))
